channel.title: Music India on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Music India on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: jumble
item.description: i hate feelings. I hate how small things can cause such weird reverberations within my self. it is hard. I can’t sleep. it hasn’t anything to do with anything. I just lay down. and I look at the ceiling. and I get kinda sad. not really depressed or pointedly sad. just a sinking feeling. like. I don’t know what is going on in my head. but I do know. it isn’t really all that weird.
